text: Once upon a time, there was a cat.
The dog barked loudly all night.
A quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
She sells seashells by the seashore.
He went to the market to buy some apples.
The sky is clear and blue today.
They played soccer in the park every weekend.
Learning new languages can be fun.
The car needed a new set of tires.
Coffee is best served hot in the morning.
